Class HeightMapCreator

Namespace
SzeneGenerator
Assembly
exerciseWithCode.dll

Creates procedural heightmaps and control maps for Terrain3D, applying noise, terrain rules, biome blending, and slope-based layer selection.

public class HeightMapCreator

GenerateAndApplyHeightMap(GodotObject)

Generates the heightmap image, applies it to Terrain3D data, and returns normalized height values for further processing.
